name: Grab 'Em All
description:
GRAB!~GRAB!~GRAB!~ Controls:

W A S D to Move.

Hold Left Button Mouse to grab PPL.

Release Left Button Mouse to drop  PPL.

It is about saving people on the earth that are still left on the city during the alien invasion. Keep them safe, destroy the aliens.

This game was made for Brakeys Game Jam 2021.2!

Hopefully you will enjoy  this game...
